about_the_game:
This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Perverted Extreme Masochist.”
Now you can play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Perverted Masochist.

～What Kind of Girl is Perverted Extreme Masochist?～
A perverted little freak who loves both teasing and being teased. She's very forward, and if you get mad at her, she'll be ecstatic about the punishment. On the other hand, if you ignore her, she'll interpret it as abandonment play and be pleased with that too. Nonetheless, she's fundamentally a nice, honest girl, and she won't screw up deliberately to receive punishment. She came to the Empire Club looking for a master who'll tease her the way she likes, but it's not as if she's okay with anyone: outside of certain people like Master and Emma, she interacts with others normally.

・1 new normal-body maid outfit!
・1 new normal-body lingerie set!
・1 new normal-body hairstyle!
・Over 70 playable Yotogi skills!
・2 types of New Yotogi events!
・4 different branches to explore between the 2 New Yotogi events!
・2 yuri events and 2 harem events!
・Hiring interview events, affection increase events, stat increase events, and plenty more opportunities for Master to talk to Perverted Masochist!
・Conversation events with Muku, Majime, and Rindere are also included!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scenes, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications. Some scenes may be interpreted as non-consensual sex. Please be advised that there are BDSM scenes in this DLC. If you are uncomfortable with the above content, we recommend you refrain from playing.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

detailed_description:
This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Perverted Extreme Masochist.”
Now you can play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Perverted Masochist.

～What Kind of Girl is Perverted Extreme Masochist?～
A perverted little freak who loves both teasing and being teased. She's very forward, and if you get mad at her, she'll be ecstatic about the punishment. On the other hand, if you ignore her, she'll interpret it as abandonment play and be pleased with that too. Nonetheless, she's fundamentally a nice, honest girl, and she won't screw up deliberately to receive punishment. She came to the Empire Club looking for a master who'll tease her the way she likes, but it's not as if she's okay with anyone: outside of certain people like Master and Emma, she interacts with others normally.
